text: So the arrival of any particular shoal fish at a certain spawning ground may be accidental. Yet there will always be some that find it if enough are travelling, just as the robin who gets back exactly may be only one among thousands who do not. But probably has a survival value in ensuring that the fry after hatching are drifted back into the normal home of the adults, by the water flow through the English Channel into the North Sea.
handwritten_text: So the arrival of any particular shoal fish at a certain spawning ground may be accidental. Yet there will always be some that find it if enough are travelling, just as the robin who gets back exactly may be only one among thousands who do not. But probably has a survival value in ensuring that the fry after hatching are drifted back into the normal home of the adults, by the water flow through the English Channel into the North Sea.
